scripts.refresh: rm -rf node_modules/ && rm package-lock.json && npm i
scripts.calendars: npm run build && env TZ=UTC node --enable-source-maps dist/from-file.js
scripts.raw: npm run build && env TZ=UTC node --enable-source-maps dist/raw.js
scripts.calendars-and-next-event: npm run build && env TZ=UTC node --enable-source-maps dist/from-file.js nextEvent
scripts.calendars-and-todays-events: npm run build && env TZ=UTC node --enable-source-maps dist/from-file.js eventsToday
scripts.calendars-and-tomorrows-events: npm run build && env TZ=UTC node --enable-source-maps dist/from-file.js eventsTomorrow
